name: eu-state-aid
notes:
### About

Overview:

> This multi-criteria search tool provides information on and access to all State aid cases that have been the object of a Commission decision since 1st January 2000. In addition, it provides information on block exemption cases registered by the Commission. Ongoing cases for which no decision has yet been taken are not included.

### Downloads

Main state aid cases are available through a search tool, with no bulk download facility:

 * <http://ec.europa.eu/competition/elojade/isef/index.cfm>

There are several direct downloads available, including:

 * <http://ec.europa.eu/competition/state_aid/register/transparency_table_2007.xls>
 * <http://ec.europa.eu/competition/state_aid/register/transparency_table_2008.pdf>
 * <http://ec.europa.eu/competition/state_aid/register/transparency_table_2009.pdf>

### Openness

Free to be re-used as long as attribution is given. The [Copyright notice](http://ec.europa.eu/geninfo/legal_notices_en.htm#copyright) on the European Commission website states:

> Reproduction is authorised, provided the source is acknowledged, save where otherwise stated.

> Where prior permission must be obtained for the reproduction or use of textual and multimedia information (sound, images, software, etc.), such permission shall cancel the above-mentioned general permission and shall clearly indicate any restrictions on use.
title: Europa - European Commission - Competition
